author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Madras High Court on Thursday dismissed a bail plea moved by Vasuki, correspondent of S.V.S. Medical College of Naturopathy and Yoga who was arrested in connection with the suspicious death of three girl students of the institution.

However, Justice K. Kalyanasundaram granted conditional bail to the other two accused, Swagar Varma, son of Vasuki, and car driver Peru. Venkatesan.

The court directed the duo to appear before the investigating officer twice a day at 10 a.m. and 5 p.m till further orders.
title: SVS row: bail plea of correspondent dismissed
